actions.revokeDescription: This device will be disabled but can log in again later.

hero.title: Learn Italian with Phan Tâm
hero.description:
Every language opens the door to a new world.
Let Phan Tâm guide you on your journey to mastering Italian.

courses.title: Featured Courses
courses.description: Carefully designed courses that take you from beginner to fluent speaker.

course1.title: Italian for Beginners
course1.description: Start your Italian journey with essential vocabulary, core grammar foundations, and practical communication skills for everyday situations.

course2.title: Intermediate Italian Mastery
course2.description: Enhance your Italian with advanced grammar structures, idiomatic expressions, and cultural insights to communicate with confidence.

course3.title: Advanced Conversation
course3.description: Refine your fluency with advanced topics, professional Italian, and nuanced communication skills for work and travel.

quiz.title: Practice Italian with Our Smart Quiz System
quiz.description: Reinforce your knowledge after each lesson with adaptive tests, instant feedback, and gamified challenges that keep you motivated.

adaptive.title: Adaptive Learning Path
adaptive.description: The system automatically adjusts difficulty based on your progress to keep you consistently challenged.

feedback.title: Instant Feedback
feedback.description: Every answer includes explanations and examples to help you understand deeply and remember longer.

certification.title: Certification Ready
certification.description: Complete quiz milestones to unlock badges and certificates that recognize your achievements.

summary.title: Live Performance
summary.caption: Keep going! You're making excellent progress toward mastering intermediate vocabulary.

preview.title: Italian Vocabulary Quiz
preview.subtitle: Question 3 – 12 Remaining
preview.question: What is the correct translation of "Buongiorno"?

instructor.title: Learn with Phan Tâm
instructor.description: With nearly a decade of experience teaching Italian to international students, Phan Tâm brings a unique combination of linguistic expertise and cultural passion to every lesson.

certified.title: Translation & Interpretation Expert
certified.description: Extensive experience across multiple sectors including politics, economics, medicine, banking, dentistry, research, agriculture, and Italian-Vietnamese enterprises.

cultural.title: Cultural Immersion
cultural.description: 10 years living in Italy and 8 years teaching Italian.

method.title: Professional Experience
method.description: 6 years of translation and interpretation experience since 2022 after the COVID period.

testimonials.title: What Our Students Say
testimonials.description: Join thousands of satisfied learners who have achieved their Italian language goals.

testimonial1.text: Ms. Tâm teaches in such a clear and engaging way! In just 3 months, I went from knowing nothing to confidently ordering food at an Italian restaurant.
testimonial1.author: Nguyễn Minh Anh

testimonial2.text: The intermediate course exceeded my expectations! It wasn’t just grammar — I learned so much about Italian culture too. It felt like traveling while studying.
testimonial2.author: Trần Quốc Huy

testimonial3.text: Investing in Italian lessons with Ms. Tâm was the best decision I’ve made! Thanks to the advanced course, I secured a job in Milan.
testimonial3.author: Lê Thu Trang
